name: (Martial Artist, Dirty Fighting) Sand in Your Eye

description.value: The martial artist [[/act feint]]{Feints}. On a success, the martial artist tosses sand into the face of one target, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded]{Blinding} them for 1 round or until the target Interacts to remove the blinded condition.
